Gemini analysis failed: 429 You exceeded your current quota.
Shopify upload failed: Shopify API error: 422 - {"errors":{"title":["is too long (maximum is 255 characters)"]}}
Gemini analysis failed: 429 You exceeded your current quota.

notes: This catalog monitoring run encountered multiple failure types: (1) Gemini API quota errors prevented product extraction, (2) Bad extraction data resulted in 'Skip to main content' being used as product titles, which exceeded Shopify's 255-character limit. The presence of 'Skip to main content' as titles indicates the extractor was grabbing navigation/page elements instead of product data. This suggests both API quota issues AND extraction quality problems. Enhanced failure tracking was not yet deployed during this run, so product URLs are marked as 'unknown'.
action_items: Upgrade or monitor Gemini API quota limits
Investigate why 'Skip to main content' is being extracted as product titles
Consider adding validation to reject products with obvious bad data before Shopify upload
